title: Game Scoop Episode 622
description: Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast! This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Michael Swaim, Sam Claiborn, and Justin Davis -- are discussing topics like the Star Wars Knights of the Old Republic remake, the Super Potato retro game store, Disco Elysium, There Is No Game, and more. And, of course, they play Video Game 20 Questions.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
